alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Bellevue and Vicinity; Bremerton and Vicinity; East Puget Sound Lowlands; Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:07PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Kitsap...southwestern Snohomish...northwestern King and southeastern Island Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 104 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edmonds, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seattle, Bellevue, Everett, Edmonds, Redmond, Kirkland, Sammamish, Lynnwood, Bothell, Mukilteo, Mountlake Terrace, Mill Creek, Monroe, Woodinville, Snohomish, Shoreline, Kenmore, Lake Forest Park, Indianola and Brier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
